item.title: Fallout 76 Player Recreates Infamous Call of Duty Zombies Map
item.description:
Highlights

  • One Fallout 76 player created a C.A.M.P. inspired by the Call of Duty Zombies map Nacht Der Untoten.
  • The player took inspiration from the first two versions of the iconic level, and even positioned it next to a ghoul spawn in order to keep up with the zombie theme.

One Fallout 76 player with some serious design skills has recently put together a C.A.M.P. inspired by Nacht Der Untoten, an iconic Call of Duty Zombies map. Their inventive creation later made the rounds on social media, impressing many Fallout 76 fans.

Nacht Der Untoten, which literally translates to "Night of the Undead," is the first-ever Call of Duty Zombies map. Its original iteration debuted in the 2008 Call of Duty: World at War and returned in a slightly altered form as part of CoD: Black Ops two years later. Since then, Call of Duty Zombies has treated Nacht Der Untoten to multiple revisions, some bigger than others.

Nacht Der Untoten Recreated in Fallout 76

Reddit user RyanGosliwafflez recently decided to pay tribute to the iconic level by using it as inspiration for building their Fallout 76 base. The end result of their efforts is remarkably faithful to Nacht Der Untoten, both in terms of configuration and aesthetic. Since Nacht Der Untoten is by far the smallest of all Call of Duty Zombies maps, featuring only three rooms, the player was able to recreate the level's layout in its entirety. RyanGosliwafflez primarily modeled their C.A.M.P. after the Black Ops version of the level, although they also took some inspiration from its World at War edition.

Keeping up with the overall theme, the player opted to situate their Nacht Der Untoten recreation near a spot that spawns ghouls, the closest thing the game has to zombies. Although they did not reveal the exact location of their Fallout 76 camp, the color of the sky seen in the images of the building suggests that they opted to build somewhere in the Mire, a swampy region in the eastern and northeastern parts of Appalachia.

RyanGosliwafflez's creation recently surfaced on Reddit, eliciting praise from other Fallout 76 players. Multiple fans said that the C.A.M.P. absolutely nailed Nacht Der Untoten, to the point that just seeing it instantly made them nostalgic. Reflecting on their achievement, the creator revealed that the entire build took about a day's worth of play to complete, with hourly breaks for completing Fallout 76 's currently ongoing Grahm's Meat-Cook event.

RyanGosliwafflez is still in the process of tweaking their Nacht Der Untoten recreation, having said that they had already improved its central staircase since they first shared it online. The player has also been trying to decorate their base with some mannequins, but found that to be challenging due how much C.A.M.P. budget they require.

item.title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer
item.description: Take a look at the official gameplay overview trailer for Pokémon Scarlet & Violet. The games feature the all-new Paldea region, full of new Pokémon to discover and areas to explore.

item.title: Pokemon GO Stadium Sights - All Research Tasks And Rewards
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Pokemon GO Stadium Sights - All Field Research Tasks And Rewards
  • Pokemon GO Stadium Sights - All Glide to Victory Timed Research Tasks And Rewards

The Pokemon GO Stadium Sights event brings in multiple Research quests that offer valuable rewards. This event comprises individual Field Research and Timed Research; completing them rewards various in-game items and Pokemon encounters. Shiny Emolga may also spawn as a reward encounter.

You can participate in the Pokemon GO Stadium Sights event starting on Saturday, June 1, 2024, at 10 AM Local Time and running for 4 days before ending on Tuesday, June 4, 2024, at 8 PM Local Time . There are different rewards for the Stadium Sights Field Research and the Glide to Victory Timed Research, with chances of encountering Shiny Pokemon, too. That said, this guide details all the Stadium Sights Research tasks and rewards.

Pokemon GO Stadium Sights - All Field Research Tasks And Rewards

The Stadium Sights Field Research quest consists of 4 tasks with different possible rewards; completing the tasks offers one of these possible rewards. The Field Research tasks include catching several Flying‑type Pokemon, exploring distances, and more. Regarding the rewards, you can encounter Emolga, Pidgey, Zubat, and Duduo with the chance of being Shiny; there are also in-game items like different types of Poke Ball and Razz Berry.

Field Research Tasks

Possible Rewards

Catch 5 Flying‑type Pokemon

  • Pidgey Encounter (Shiny Available)
  • Zubat Encounter (Shiny Available)
  • Doduo Encounter (Shiny Available)

Explore 1 km

  • Poke Ball ×5
  • Great Ball ×2
  • Razz Berry ×2

Explore 2 km

Emolga Encounter (Shiny Available)

Spin 5 PokeStops

  • Poke Ball ×5
  • Great Ball ×2
  • Razz Berry ×2

Pokemon GO Stadium Sights - All Glide to Victory Timed Research Tasks And Rewards

You can access the Stadium Sights Glide to Victory Timed Research for US $1.99 or an equal price in their local currency. Purchase the ticket in real currency; trainers cannot buy it through PokeCoins. The Research quest focuses on exploring and hatching Pokemon GO Eggs. Since the Timed Research expires, you must complete all the tasks and claim rewards before Tuesday, June 4, 2024, at 8 PM Local Time .

The Glide to Victory Timed Research comprises 1 Step with 5 different tasks; completing each offers an individual reward. These rewards include multiple Emolga encounters, Super Incubator, and Pokemon GO Candies.

STEP ONE

Timed Research Tasks

Rewards

Hatch an Egg

Incubator ×1

Explore 5 km

Emolga Encounter

Spin 10 PokeStops

Emolga Encounter

Catch 20 Pokemon

Emolga Encounter

Hatch 3 Eggs

Emolga Encounter

Rewards For Completion

  • Super Incubator ×1
  • Emolga Encounter
  • Emolga Candy ×20

You can purchase and gift tickets to your Pokemon GO friends at the Great Friends level or higher. But keep in mind that all purchases, including gifts, are non-refundable (subject to law and the Terms of Service).

item.title: New York Times Strands Hints and Answers for June 2, 2024
item.description:
Strands has yet another letter jumble with a bunch of words hidden inside of it. If you are stuck on June 2, 2024's seemingly impossible puzzle and looking for some clues, you can find a whole slew of helpful suggestions below.

This article is designed for those who already know the rules of how to play Strands and are looking for help with puzzle number 91. Below, you can find general tips, the spoiler for the whole puzzle, word spoilers, and even an explanation of what the puzzle means. The guide tries to provide a wide assortment of hints to suit most people's needs.

The NYT Games Strands Puzzle #91 for June 2, 2024

The Strands puzzle for today has the clue Nailed It! There are a total of eight things to find: one Spangram and seven themed words.

New York Times Games Strands Clues

Want a few hints for this challenging puzzle game? Each one of the sections below contains just one general hint that won't spoil any of the words in the puzzle.

Spoiler 2

The Answer to Today's New York Times Games Strands

If you want to see the full answer to this word puzzle that can make you smarter, you can find it in the section below. It includes the Spangram and the themed words along with where you can find them in the puzzle.

Today's Strands Explained

If you finished today's puzzle, but you still don't get it, the section below is for you. In the expandable section, you can find a full explanation for how the clue and the themed words all fit together.

item.title: New York Times Connections Hints and Answers for #356 June 2, 2024
item.description:
Connections is back with another sixteen words for players to sort into four mystery sections. However, the game's June 2, 2024, puzzle is pretty difficult, more so than the seemingly simple rules for Connections might indicate. As always, this challenge may be hard to complete with fewer than four mistakes.

If you are stumbling on today's puzzle and running out of guesses and luck, you can find all the help you need in the article below. This contains helpful hints like category clues, general hints, and even spoilers too.

Words in the NYT Connections Puzzle #357 for June 2, 2024

The Connections puzzle for June 2, 2024, contains the words: Mobile, Followers, Shovels, Buffalo, Likes, Insults, Shares, Sheep, Apartment, Billings, Puppets, Options, Equity, Pheonix, Stocks, and Lemmings.

What is the Definition of Lemmings?

Lemmings is the plural form of the word lemming, which refers to a small mouselike creature that are known for massive migrations that sometimes lead them through water. This led to a myth that lemmings would follow one another no matter what, even if the lemming in front of them drowned. This has turned lemming into a sort of insult that can be used to describe someone who is a sheep, or who follows the herd even to their detriment.

Lemmings was also a hit video game, originally released in the 1990s for PC.

Hints for the NYT Connections Puzzle #357 for June 2, 2024

Need a hint? You can find all sorts of helpful tips in the expandable sections below. Click on the "Read More" button underneath the header of the item you wish to see in this minimalist puzzle game.
